title: Handle Customer Portal Account Lockout
description: A retailer's employee has been locked out of the online ordering portal after too many failed login attempts.

tasks.description: Receive a call from the user who is locked out.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user is who they say they are.

tasks.description: Unlock the user's account and trigger a password reset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent unlocks the account and sends a password reset link to the user's email.
